download_path: /sungbum updated 4 26 23 bk/rgyud_secret teachings (tantra)/spyi_general treatments/bstod pa_eulogies (stotra)/s05579_je btzun thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'bum thor bu las chos rgyal chen po tse ring mched lnga rdo rje grags mo rgyal rdo rje g-yu sgron ma 'phyos lha kong btzun de mo 'o de gung rgyal sogs kyi gsol kha bstod pa dang bcas pa rnams_supplication +.txt
meta_text: along with Praises of Holy Beings Including the King of All Things (Dharmaraja), the Five Sisters of Long Life, and the Goddesses Named Renowned Diamond of Victory, The Diamond Lamp of Turquiose, Angel of Ferocity, The Queen of Demo in Kong, and Odey Gung Gyel, from Assorted Writings found in the Collected Works of the Holy and Omniscient One_RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO (1476-1542)
title_tib: JE BTZUN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I GSUNG 'BUM THOR BU LAS CHOS RGYAL CHEN PO TSE RING MCHED LNGA RDO RJE GRAGS MO RGYAL RDO RJE G-YU SGRON MA 'PHYOS LHA KONG BTZUN DE MO 'O DE GUNG RGYAL SOGS KYI GSOL KHA BSTOD PA DANG BCAS PA RNAMS
title_eng: Supplicationalong with Praises of Holy Beings Including the King of All Things (Dharmaraja), the Five Sisters of Long Life, and the Goddesses Named Renowned Diamond of Victory, The Diamond Lamp of Turquiose, Angel of Ferocity, The Queen of Demo in Kong, and Odey Gung Gyel, from Assorted Writings found in the Collected Works of the Holy and Omniscient One
